channel.title: My Client & Source. ******HELP*****
channel.description:
Im having problems with my client. 1. I start up my source. ( It says: Online. ) 2. I go to my client's website address. Click sign in put my username and pass then the client loads. After loading my person pops up invisable with a random gamertag, then the client freezes. 3. After freezing all that stuff pops up 1. reset your browser. blahh blahh.
I just want to know how to stop my server from freezing. If you want to know the spacific server I downloaded from here i'll give it to you.
I have done absolulty every step that im supposed to. The server is a 317. I opend a gaming port in my moddum. I downloaded no-ip. I went in my computer and got my ip. Is there absolutly anything that i could have done wrong to make my server freeze when trying to loggin??
It absolutly works 100% when I play it from my comp. But when I try to from that host site it freezes. Is that site bad or something?
I'm going to try to get a new source but here is what I think is wrong about that: 1. Will the client and the source be the same? If not does it matter??? 2. If downloading then new source i have to 1st take my ip off the old one before putting my ip on the new, correct?? 3. If a source is the same as in (317) but different in items from the client will that mess it up???

item.title: My Client & Source. ******HELP*****
item.dc:creator: @Ninja111 Ninja111
item.description:
@Ninja111 wrote:

Well i know that…
That’s why im asking does “anyone” know of a clean client (+) source that you could give me a link to download?
What i ment by that was: It’s not leached, It’s not buged or glitched, and its a amazing sever for a starter to download.
I want the server to be able to put my ip in. I have a website and i want the server to be my game of the site. If absolutly anyone knows of a clean client (+) source THATS CUSTOMIZABLE with no bugs then please tell me. ( Please give link. )
Or hey, you can give me a walkthrough of how you got your first server online. I had a server i downloaded from here online, its just im not a “good” coder yet and i didnt know how to fix that damn shop glitch so i got pissed and deleted the server. now i cant find it, and all the other servers i download are fin LEACHED!@@!!@@!

Read full topic

item.title: My Client & Source. ******HELP*****
item.dc:creator: @smokin_flax smokin flax
item.description:
@smokin_flax wrote:

[quote=“Ninja111, post:5, topic:385868”]Well now I honestly don’t give a shit about that last client (+) source i had cause i found out it was leached. I was wanting to know does ANYONE here have a blank client (+) source that’s 317 through 474 that is customizable, nonleached, and absolutly amazing for bigginers. If you do or have ANY suggestions then please give me one. The last client (+) source I had was absolutly what i wanted. Here let me say what it “had”:

  1. Amazing staffzone.
  2. Amazing teles.
  3. Amazing owner commands.
  4. Easy customization.

BUT, the reason im not using it nomore is because it had to many shop trade (bugs).
When I traded one of the shop keepers I would freeze.
But i had that server ONLINE and it was my 1st one EVER!@!@
I just need a little help. Ill redownload that server if someone will tell me how to fix those damn glithes!@[/quote]
blank wouldn’t have those things you listed.

Read full topic

item.title: My Client & Source. ******HELP*****
item.dc:creator: @eragourn1 eragourn1
item.description:
@eragourn1 wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:2, topic:385868”]The source and client have to be compatible with each other. If you actually got past the login then I don’t think there’s anything wrong with your connection/computer. On the main thread, check if the source comes with a client.[/quote]Agreed

Read full topic

item.title: My Client & Source. ******HELP*****
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

The source and client have to be compatible with each other. If you actually got past the login then I don’t think there’s anything wrong with your connection/computer. On the main thread, check if the source comes with a client.

Read full topic

item.title: My Client & Source. ******HELP*****
item.dc:creator: @Ninja111 Ninja111
item.description:
@Ninja111 wrote:

Im having problems with my client.

  1. I start up my source. ( It says: Online. )
  2. I go to my client’s website address. Click sign in put my username and pass then the client loads. After loading my person pops up invisable with a random gamertag, then the client freezes.
  3. After freezing all that stuff pops up 1. reset your browser. blahh blahh.

I just want to know how to stop my server from freezing. If you want to know the spacific server I downloaded from here i’ll give it to you.

I have done absolulty every step that im supposed to. The server is a 317. I opend a gaming port in my moddum. I downloaded no-ip. I went in my computer and got my ip. Is there absolutly anything that i could have done wrong to make my server freeze when trying to loggin??

It absolutly works 100% when I play it from my comp.
But when I try to from that host site it freezes.
Is that site bad or something?

I’m going to try to get a new source but here is what I think is wrong about that:

  3. If a source is the same as in (317) but different in items from the client will that mess it up???
